one of the best games ive ever played  nobody saves the world is an absolute gem its packed with content tons of side quests and a brilliantly designed world that keeps you hooked for hours the formswapping mechanic is super innovative  combining different forms and skills opens up endless fun and strategic possibilities whether youre exploring dungeons or just experimenting with builds it never gets boring highly recommended
